string.name: swipe_to_browse
string.description: This is a tooltip that tells the user they can swipe on the touchpad to browse through folders. It is accompanied by arrows indicated the direction to swipe.

string.name: out_of_memory
string.description: This is a warning message that informs the user to free up some memory in order to run the app

resources.string: To use Oculus 360 Photos, please free up at least %1$sKB of device storage on your phone.
